attributes.action: stop taxing the lower paid to fund lower taxes for the high earners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordan brown is scrapping the 10%tax rate for the low earners.Anyone on 15,ooo or less will pay more tax,whilst the high earners will benefit.robin hood in reverse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
